hanzi-su-wiki:
賭

Значения

Пари; держать пари

Мнемоника

Те 者, кто спорят на деньги 貝.

Варианты

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 赌)
Pictophonetic: 者 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
賭博 [ dǔ bó ]: to gamble
賭氣 [ dǔ qì ]: to act in a fit of pique; to get in a huff; to be peeved
賭場 [ dǔ chǎng ]: casino
賭注 [ dǔ zhù ]: stake (in a gamble); (what is at) stake
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
    • 者 [ zhě ] that which; they who; those who
heisig_chinese_memo: My puppet likes to gamble for shells. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: gamble, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun, day
koohiiStory1: When we gamble at the shell game, I always win against my love doll.
koohiiStory2: People who gamble compulsively are like puppets controlled by money.
jp_example_words:
賭け(かけ): betting, gambling, a gamble
賭ける(かける): to wager, to bet, to risk, to stake, to gamble
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: I'm putting all my shellfish on someone, hoping they'll win the race! This is a gamble and you're gambling.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Remember, shellfish used to be used as money. So if you're betting shellfish on someone, you're just gambling. And you probably won't get any of those shellfish back.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you win this gamble you'll have enough shellfish to buy a brand new car (か)!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you go to any of those fancy (and not so fancy) gamble-places, they always have a car sitting in the middle of the room. Usually rotating, really slowly, to make you want it more, making you gamble more.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 老 (старик), 日 (день), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: dǔ: (глаг) играть в азартные игры, держать пари
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shellfish (貝) person (者) gambles
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My puppet gets a weekly allowance, but always wants to gamble so spends the shells on that.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Bei " and " Zhe ", it means that money is used as an injection to compare winning or losing. "Shuowen Xin Fu": "Bo Yan Ye. From Bei, Zhe Sheng." Niu Shuyu's new attached test: "Gambling righteousness should be based on shooting. In ancient times, it is said that shooting is near the capital. Later generations may borrow as the capital, and then change it to gambling. "Three Kingdoms Wu Weizhao" "Game Theory": "It is easy to gamble and clothes, move chess easily, the meaning of shame is relaxed, but the color of anger is hair."

" Bet " can generally refer to winning or losing. "The Biography of Wei Shu·Ren Cheng Wang Cheng": "Te Ling Cheng is a seven-character rhyme, gambling with Gaozu."

" Gambling " can also mean relying on it. Song Yanshu "Song Ting Liu·Song Giver": "I live in the Western Qin Dynasty. I carry my gambling skills with me. On the blooming willows, I am new to the front. I learn from the tone of "Niannu", sometimes high and high.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Bei " and " Zhe ", it means that money is used as an injection to compare winning or losing.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「者」聲，表示用財物作注比輸贏。《說文新附》：「博簺也。从貝，者聲。」鈕樹玉新附考：「賭義當本於射，古讀射近都，後人或借作都，又改作賭耳。」 三國吳韋昭〈博弈論〉：「至或賭及衣物，徙棋易行，廉恥之意弛，而忿戾之色發。」

　　「賭」可泛指比輸贏。《魏書‧任城王澄傳》：「特令澄為七言連韻，與高祖往復賭賽。」

　　「賭」還可表示憑藉。宋晏殊〈山亭柳‧贈歌者〉：「家住西秦。賭博藝隨身。花柳上，鬥尖新。偶學〈念奴〉聲調，有時高遏行雲。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「者」聲，表示用財物作注比輸贏。

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
    • 者 [ zhě ] that which; they who; those who
①用財物作注來爭輸贏：賭博。賭注。賭場。賭徒。[合]賭東(以做東道賭輸贏，輸者做東道置酒請客)；賭對(賭博，賭賽)；賭色(擲色子賭博)；賭郡(用郡官作爲賭注)；聚賭(聚在一起賭博)；賭術(賭博的本領)；賭錢(以金錢爲輸贏的賭博)；賭運(賭博的運氣)；賭販(賭棍)；賭經(專記賭術的書籍。)

賭け(かけ): betting, gambling, a gamble
賭ける(かける): to wager, to bet, to risk, to stake, to gamble

從「 貝 」，「 者 」聲，表示用財物作注比輸贏。《說文新附》：「博簺也。从貝，者聲。」鈕樹玉新附考：「賭義當本於射，古讀射近都，後人或借作都，又改作賭耳。」 三國吳韋昭〈博弈論〉：「至或賭及衣物，徙棋易行，廉恥之意弛，而忿戾之色發。」 「 賭 」可泛指比輸贏。《魏書‧任城王澄傳》：「特令澄為七言連韻，與高祖往復賭賽。」 「 賭 」還可表示憑藉。宋晏殊〈山亭柳‧贈歌者〉：「家住西秦。賭博藝隨身。花柳上，鬥尖新。偶學〈念奴〉聲調，有時高遏行雲。」
From the sound of " Bei" and " Zhe", it means that money is used as an injection to compare winning or losing. "Shuowen Xin Fu": "Bo Yan Ye. From Bei, Zhe Sheng." Niu Shuyu's new attached test: "Gambling righteousness should be based on shooting. In ancient times, it is said that shooting is near the capital. Later generations may borrow as the capital, and then change it to gambling. "Three Kingdoms Wu Weizhao" "Game Theory": "It is easy to gamble and clothes, move chess easily, the meaning of shame is relaxed, but the color of anger is hair." " Bet" can generally refer to winning or losing. "The Biography of Wei Shu·Ren Cheng Wang Cheng": "Te Ling Cheng is a seven-character rhyme, gambling with Gaozu." " Gambling" can also mean relying on it. Song Yanshu "Song Ting Liu·Song Giver": "I live in the Western Qin Dynasty. I carry my gambling skills with me. On the blooming willows, I am new to the front. I learn from the tone of "Niannu", sometimes high and high.

賭字的基本解释

賭
dǔ
见“赌”。

賭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǔ］
［《廣韻》當古切，上姥，端。］
“赌1”的繁体字。
(1)用财物作注比输赢。
(2)泛指比胜负；争输赢。
(3)赢取，赚取。
(4)依凭，倚仗。

賭字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賭； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1210第17
【唐韻】當古切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】董五切，?音睹。【說文】博簺也。【博雅】奕取也。【廣韻】戲賭。【晉書·謝安傳】安與兄子?圍碁，賭別墅，勝之。又【羊?保傳】與帝奕，賭郡，保勝，補宣城守。　又【玉篇】賭，䞈也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǔ］
["Guangyun" when ancient cut, grandma, end. ]
"Bet 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Use money as an injection to compare winning or losing.
(2) Refers generally to victory or defeat; competition to win or lose.
(3) Win, earn.
(4) Rely on, rely on.

dǔ
вм. 赌
Radicals: 貝, 者  (shellfish, someone)
Meaning Mnemonic
I'm putting all my shellfish on someone, hoping they'll win the race! This is a gamble and you're gambling.
Remember, shellfish used to be used as money. So if you're betting shellfish on someone, you're just gambling. And you probably won't get any of those shellfish back.
Reading Mnemonic
If you win this gamble you'll have enough shellfish to buy a brand new car (か)!
If you go to any of those fancy (and not so fancy) gamble-places, they always have a car sitting in the middle of the room. Usually rotating, really slowly, to make you want it more, making you gamble more.
